content: कार्तिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [कृत्तिका-अण्] Belonging to the month of Kārtika; <ls>R. 19. 39.</ls> --कः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the month in which the full moon is near the कृत्तिका or Pleiades (corresponding to October-November). {@--2@} An epithet of Skanda. --की The full moon day in the month of Kārtika.
